features: 【15W QI Wireless Charging Mouse pad + 30W PD charger 】The Large Mouse pad Built-in 15W wireless fast charging, which comes with a 30W PD charger and a 6.5ft PD 5A fast charging cable. This wireless charging mouse pad supports all QI wireless charging devices. such as Compatible with iPhone 8/X/XR/XS/11/11 Pro/12/12 Pro/12 pro max/13/13 Pro/13 pro max, iPhone 14 / 14 Pro, Compatible with Galaxy 10/S9/S8 Plus, Galaxy Note 9/8, Galaxy Buds and so on

【Large RGB Gaming Mouse Mat + Wrist rest 】The 31.5X11.8 Inch XXL mouse pad is large enough to fit your keyboard, phone and mouse, leaving enough room to move your mouse around as much as you wish. It fits perfectly on your desktop and provides ample space for professional gaming or office work. The ergonomic wrist rest increases the comfort and touch of your wrist and can be the most helpful for your work or gaming.

【14 RGB Led Lighting Modes】Super luminous customized 14 lighting modes, including 7 static light modes and 7 dynamic modes, which offers a distinctive atmosphere when playing games or working. Bright, colorful RGB lighting along the entire edge.One button controls light modes. The memory function helps to remember your last light mode choice when switched on. It's the best wireless charging mouse pad and office mat for your desktop.

【Non-slip Mouse Pad with 4 mm thick】With anti-slip base, this mouse pad keeps super firmly on the desk and provides heavy grip. Professional edge stitching combined with waterproof material prevents fraying and ensures longer lifespan. Whether you're a professional gamer or seeking an edge in competitions, our gaming pad helps you stay focused and in control.

【Why Choose Us 】Achieve victory in even the most intense gaming battles with our wireless charging mouse pad. Made with a comfortable Lycra surface and breathable material, our mousepad ensures lightning-fast movements while maintaining excellent precision, zero error, and accurate mouse control. The dense non-slip natural rubber base with extra heavy-duty mesh provides a sure grip, keeping the mouse and keyboard pad locked in place for a seamless gaming experience. oversized mousepad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light up mousepad for gamers
reviews.reviewText: My son is excited to use this mousepad. He is big into gaming and looking forward to adding this to his overall gaming setup. Seems like an easyset up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slick RGB deskmat with a attractive, and not too busy design. Comes with 30W PD charger
reviews.reviewText: There's a lot to like about this RGB deskmat...mainly that is has an RGB perimeter that can be adjusted with the button on the wireless charging pad. The pad could have bee integrated better, but I can understand that the mat probably isn't thick enough to hide into the mat material. it comes with a mouse wrist rest, USB A to C braided cable (seems to support QC 3.0) and a 30W PD charger that has both a USB A and a USB C (PD) port. The impressive part is that USB A port supports up to 27W (12V 1.35A) with the right device and cable. The PD port support up to 30W (20V 1.5A). But if you use both ports at the same time, you only get 5V 2A out of the A and C ports.The deskmat itself is on the thicker side (2.7mm), whereas most cheap mats are around 2mm. The wireless charging pad has a USB C power connector and claims up to 15W charging speed, but my Pixel 7 Pro could only get up to about 6~7W even with the case off. The power on/off button that looks like a finger print also turns RED when the wireless is not charging and turns BLUE when it is wireless charging.It's nice that you get a 30W PD charger in the package, but it doesn't include a PD cable...so you have to provide your own. And when you light up the deskmat, you still only get 10W (5V 2A) out of the PD port. I know wireless charging is finicky and you really have to line up the coils perfectly or you just generate heat and slow charging, but it's a nice all in one solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks fantastic, charger works great.
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this mat looks on my desk The RGB around the edges is just bright enough to be noticeable but not so bright that it's distracting or causes glare. The wireless charging pad works fantastic, and I'm able to charge my mouse, my headphones, or my phone on it without worry. The unsung hero is the wrist rest pad, though; it blends into the mouse pad behind it, but allows me to have an extra level of comfort I didn't realize I was missing. Overall, it feels high quality and is nice to work on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked great at first but then it started to randomly change lighting on it's own then that progressed to it turning off randomly. It got to the point where turning it back on wouldn't even work. It would just shut right back off. I was able to get it to light up again but it would take numerous times unplugging and plugging it back in before it would even stay on.After that, changing colors/patterns turned into a game of pure luck (if it would even stay on). The one color I want to use won't even show up now other than in a combination effect which throws off my whole setup. I wish it had no problems because the wireless charging on this works fantastic. It fast charges my Galaxy in under an hour. Who knows how long that will work properly though.I'll be ordering a similar product with higher reviews. The one time I don't check first...smh. Stay away from this one unless you want a black only pad with a good (although a gamble if you ask me) wireless charger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of this mat and it’s exactly as it advertises. Love the colors and they go perfectly with my overall stream set up.My big issue with it though is it has a very finicky charging connection with the usb-c to the mat itself and I have to wiggle it just right for it to stay on and work like it’s suppose to, or else it turns off… not sure if that’s just an issue with my particular mat or a design flaw overall but it can be super frustrating when I fight with the dang thing for multiple minutes until it stays on.Aside from that fairly big issue, everything else is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and functional
reviews.reviewText: This pad is beautiful and functional with the included wireless charging pad. The pad doesn't provide much power but can keep your phone at a consistent level if not in use.The included wrist pad for the mouse is a great addition and I find myself using it all the time while working.The non slip backing makes sure it stays where you want it to and the surround light is bright and adds a little extra flair.The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is because the printed graphic is blurry. It's not terribly blurry but enough that I can't justify the 5th star. If that isn't a big deal to you I would definitely recommend this one!

reviews.reviewerName: Mouse pad is really nice and the colors are great! Unfortunately tho it will not charge your phone. You will set phone down on the pad and it will turn on and off on the charging aspect.  I even tried taking my case off to see if that helped. Did not. Oh well...cool idea but does not work.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Liked the lights. Did not like that it won't charge phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Desk Mat
reviews.reviewText: This isn't the best picture and I have moved desks now... but this is the first desk mat I've had that lights up and it's great.I will say if you do not have one of the phones listed above, your phone may not charge. My roommate's iPhone charges just fine, but my old Android A51 or whatever doesn't charge. It recognizes something is there, but does not charge.Even with my personal phone not working with the charger, this thing is AWESOME. Work with the mat to flatten it out or roll it the opposite way. It will flatten out, just give it time. I never really used the wrist support, but I actually like this a lot. I have a large gaming mouse pad I use beside the desk mat and the cushion grips very well. It never moves.
